Description:
Job BriefWe are in search of a proficient Office Administrator with expertise in DMCC compliance and portal and accounts. This role calls for someone with a keen business sense who can manage administrative responsibilities efficiently.The Office Administrator's duties encompass bookkeeping, payables, and receivables. The right fit for this position would be an individual who excels at multitasking without requiring constant supervision – someone driven, dependable, and trustworthy. The role is pivotal in maintaining the seamless operations of our company’s offices and plays a significant part in propelling sustainable growth.Key ResponsibilitiesOversee office operations to ensure a smooth workflow.
Handle essential office renewals, including licenses, establishments, insurance, visas, and other related tasks.
Streamline office activities to guarantee efficient operations and adherence to company policies.
Organize agendas, travel arrangements, and appointments for senior management as required.
Address phone calls and manage correspondence, including emails, letters, and packages.
Oversee invoicing, budgeting, and bookkeeping tasks.
Maintain and update records in the company's financial and other databases.
Monitor office supply levels and reorder when required.
Produce timely reports and craft presentations/proposals as delegated.
Provide support to the CEO, Director, and team members as needed.
Liaise effectively with external auditors and suppliers.Skills
Skills:
Mandatory experience in DMCC compliance and portal.
Previous role as an office administrator or in a similar capacity.
Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills.
Strong organizational skills with keen attention to detail.
Familiarity with standard office management practices and foundational accounting principles.
Proficiency in MS Office and Zoho books software.
Minimum requirement: High school diploma. A BSc/BA in office administration or a related field will be an advantage.
